# R Plot

```{r plot, echo=FALSE, messages = FALSE, fig.width=10, fig.height=6}

suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))

head(mtcars) %>%
  mutate (Car = row.names(.)) %>%
  ggplot (aes (x = Car, y = mpg)) + 
  geom_col() +
  coord_flip()



  
```
